The Big Move

October 4th, 2008 · 2 Comments

The population at Chateau Perham has skyrocketed in the last 24 hours, from a reasonable 2 to an incredible 4. Rand has the sunroom of my stately manor to himself, along with the entire backyard. Tammy has apparently claimed my empty front room, guest room and my office for herself. Molly of course has the kitchen, living room and bedroom. This means that I get the laundry room and the garage. There should be enough room between my bike and car to fit a sleeping bag.


Tags: General
